thread.title: TRICHY RAJU NARAYANASWAMY
thread.title_full: Lenskart reviewed by TRICHY RAJU NARAYANASWAMY

author: TRICHY RAJU NARAYANASWAMY
title: TRICHY RAJU NARAYANASWAMY
text:
we are from Chennai.Mr. Newton who served us had done a very good job and we are very happy with his service. The frame and the lens is great. The way he tested our eye sight and also the way that he convinced us is good. And as he told us the eye glasses that we received also good. In fact he came and adjusted the frame to our face and did a great job.Thank you and also Thank him
T.R.Narayanaswamy.
